snippet.title: Battle Gear 2: World Domination Flash Game Playthrough
snippet.description:
Battle Gear 2, the wildly popular flash game and 2nd entry in the series.  This time you plan and attack countries one by one to eventually conquer the world.  It's a much appreciated upgrade and made the game a lot more fun to play.  More units, better difficulty scaling, and many new features.

It's usually better to go after the capital and to go for air force and navy battles.  Makes the game much less tedious and action packed.  You ground invade right after, so you get the best of both worlds.

▬▬ Follow Me! ▬▬

#gaming #flashgames #videogames
